role.argrole: decision or attitude being shown to be right

example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ليس) (ADVP-PRD (ADV هناك)) (SBAR-NOM-SBJ (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يسوغ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC نزعة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاحتكار))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN اي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN وجه))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اوجه) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتداولة)))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: The tendency towards monopoly in any of its present forms

example.arg: نزعة الاحتكار في اي وجه من اوجهه المتداولة
